generated.title: GeneratedEntropy
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'Entropy'

description*.en: When a small amount of heat $dQ$ is received by a system whose thermodynamic temperature is $T$, the entropy of the system increases by $dQ/T$, provided that no irreversible change takes place in the system.

title: Entropy
description: When a small amount of heat $dQ$ is received by a system whose thermodynamic temperature is $T$, the entropy of the system increases by $dQ/T$, provided that no irreversible change takes place in the system.
